venue.name: Pitkin Plaza (off Orange, between Chapel & Court)

item.description:
Come on out to New Haven's free Ideat Village "circus"/fire/belly dance/magic/tarot/art/music event!  6-10pm, 1 block from the Green, at Pitkin Plaza (next to Devil's Gear & Bru).  Just walk behind city hall and listen for it.
http://calamitynane.tripod.com/2012/circus.html

Stilters, hoopers, strongmen, magicians, a bike stunt show, belly dancers, fire, tarot cards, yoga, and more.  Also a free session of Dr. Sketchy's Anti-Art School.  Models will be there to draw.  Bring paper and drawing supplies (though they often can lend you some for free).
Dr. Sketchy: http://www.drsketchy.com/branch/NewHaven
http://www.facebook.com/groups/63263606469/

3 music acts, one every hour, starting at 7pm. Back From Earth, Dada Mr. / Symphonic Bodega, Sun Dagger

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP (texting is fine too).
item.name: Thu. 6/28 - Free New Haven "circus"/fire/belly dance/magic/tarot/art/music event
